components: SUSPENSION,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, OTHER
summary: THE CONSUMER HAS EXPERIENCED THE FOLLOWING:  THE FRONT END SUSPENSION ARM NEEDS CHANGING, RACK PINION ASSEMBLY IS LEAKING OIL AND INTERNAL NOISES, THE PUMP CAP HAS BEEN CHANGED TWICE (THE PRESSURE OIL RETURNS TO THE CAP), AND THE REAR CRANKSHAFT SEAL IS LEAKING.  SCC
